Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory132.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Where are you going? I don't mind following you all the way to the Demon King's Castle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "But as you can see, Camu's not very patient.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'Leave me out of this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: "It's a dead end...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'One could not run forever. Neither the Demon King nor Liv had any idea where to go.'}
{3: 'They fell into a trap left by Vera in panic and were surrounded after more guards arrived.'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Are you after the Demon King?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "He's just an unexpected bonus. We want you, Liv, the Holy Maiden of the game.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'The Demon King also calls me the Holy Maiden. What does that really mean!?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "It's the name given to those who can repair the artifact. It seems to be a special class generated by the system based on the player's skill.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Those who can repair the artifact... Demon King, is that the last resort you are thinking?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Yes. But I have never tried it myself, so...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Whoever gets the artifact gets the power of the Goddess. That seems to be how this game is configured. Whether it's the King or the Demon King doesn't matter.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Everybody has their eyes on this power.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Anyway, if we get you, we get half of the artifact. Your Commandant will bring the other half to us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Commandant... Right, I see Commandant and Karenina's names popping up on the menu.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Demon King', 3: 'Wait, do you also have other artifact fragments?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "Yeah, we have three, but it's only a matter of time before we get the last piece. You stand no chance, Demon King.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera waved her hand, sending all the guards forward.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Demon King', 3: "Hmm... I'll be your shield, Holy Maiden. As long as you can get away...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'No matter how far we run, they will come and get us... Courage is what we need most now.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah, I thought you were going to try to convince us.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I know you won't be easily swayed. If I want to help the Demon King and this world...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'I must defeat you right here.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: "That's not going to happen.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'A greatsword pierced the ground just when Liv was about to take a step forward. Camu suddenly appeared behind her.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Just stop resisting, medic!', 4: '1'}
